story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh, what a pleasant surprise! How nice to see you
all taking in the sights!
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What?! Hold on—I wouldn’t call this a
pleasant surprise!
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Hmm? What are you talking about?
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I beg your pardon?! What do you mean, Chairman
Rose was arrested? How rude of you!
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_0800_10: This is clearly a case of defamation, and—
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_1400_10: Neither of them seems to remember anything!
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
It didn’t look like they were lying or trying to
play innocent...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_1700_10: they really haven’t done anything wrong?
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
People who have come to Pasio have
been saying...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2000_10:
that after they arrive, they sometimes remember or
acknowledge things slightly differently than their
friends...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Maybe, for some reason, there are people coming
to Pasio from a slightly different time?
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: Many strange things do happen on Pasio...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2300_10: Which means those two over there...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2400_10:
might be Chairman Rose and Oleana from before
they caused the Darkest Day in Galar.
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2500_10: Do you think they might start something on Pasio?
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I suppose Chairman Rose’s “wish” hasn’t changed
since then...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Excuse me? What have you been whispering about
this whole time?
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_3000_10:
We’ve finally gotten to see each other. I’d be
delighted if you all talked to me as well!
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: Oh, s-sorry! We’re done now! Haha...
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_3200_10:
I have an idea! It would be a waste to simply
stand here and talk.
story_galar_01_02000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Why don’t we have a chat while walking
around Pasio?
